column4: Ubuntu 10.10 | 2.6.35-27-generic | ATI Radeon X1300 512MB AGP4X |        *intermittent screen flickering*  any known workarounds? already checked power saving options and once heard of possibly using a polling option? but at the time didnt have a kernel version that utilized polling options... theres gotta be a way to fix this flickering :-[
